question: A friend of yours is thinking of going on a camping holiday for the first time this summer. He / She has asked for your advice.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter• explain why you think your friend would enjoy a camping holiday• describe some possible disadvantages• say whether you would like to go camping with your friend this summer
text: I have received your message by email. I'm writing you this letter with regard to your vacation. I have liked your thought. I am ready to answer your questions and give you some advice.

First of all, I am totally sure this trip out of the country can help you to expand your horizon. You will be able to apply your knowledge about the environment,as you will be living in a tent outside during all periods of time on your vacation. Despite all difficulties, you may encounter. You should know, that I certainly support your ideas,which can serve as inspiration to go on your writing your article in a geographical journal.

You may face challenges difficulties, but you should not be afraid of it. What I mean, It is enormous queues at the airport in summer. The main reason for the enormous crowd and queues is the period of time. Human beings desire to go somewhere for relaxing. Furthermore, the camping holiday has become extremely popular among tourists, it has caused the high price.
Unfortunately, I am snowed in with work and I will not be able to go on vacation with you. I am inclined to apologise for that. I hope you will relax and get positive emotions.
Please, give me a call and share your experience when you have come back home.
